lead_paragraph: The children of an inmate who died at Utah State Prison have sued corrections officials and health care providers, accusing them of violating his father’s civil rights by failing to give him dialysis for two days.

headline.main: Utah Sued Over Fatal Mix-Up at Prison
headline.print_headline: Utah Sued Over Fatal Mix-Up at Prison

snippet: The children of an inmate who died at Utah State Prison have sued corrections officials and health care providers, accusing them of violating his father’s civil rights by failing to give him dialysis for two days.
